title: Bug 12398 - Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398 - Accessibility problems. I need to first click on one of the "live" areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the navigation frame, or the content frame).
OB: On March 26, 2002, when I launch the Help view on Windows 2000, the tab key does not have any effect.
EB: The Help view should be launchable in a way that allows immediate navigation via the keyboard.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch the application.
2. Open the Help view.
3. Use the tab key and observe that it has no effect.
4. Click on one of the "live" areas, such as the banner with the tool buttons, the navigation frame, or the content frame.
5. Use the tab key again and verify that it is now functioning as expected.
